**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .
   

  

 To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

title: Senior iOS Developer • Product Library
description:
**The Company**
 PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy.
   

  

 We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.
   

  

 We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards. Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade.
   

  

 Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.
   

  

**Job Description Summary:**
 As PayPal continues its mission to revolutionize commerce, we're seeking a creative and experienced iOS Developer to join our Product Library Team in Stockholm. In this role, you'll collaborate with a crowd of bright minds dedicated to creating and maintaining a high-quality product library on iOS and Android POS apps. If this already sparks your interest, keep reading – the best is yet to come!
   

  

**Job Description:**
**Meet our team**
 As part of our Point of Sale Alliance, our Product Library Team's mission is to develop the fastest and most intuitive product and inventory management tool, enabling our merchants to save time and increase profits. By joining us, you'll collaborate with a diverse group of passionate professionals, including Product Managers, Mobile Developers, QAs, and more.
   

  

**Your way to impact**
 As you step into this position, you'll join a talented team committed to helping Everyday Sellers streamline their operations and boost profits through our cutting-edge product and inventory management tools. Your contribution will be key in developing innovative solutions and crafting tailored user experiences for our merchants.
   

  

 Additionally, you'll have plenty of opportunities to work closely with various teams and iOS developers throughout our entire iOS Chapter. This will involve engaging in code reviews, brainstorming sessions, mob programming (which we're big fans of), participating in our hack-weeks to launch disruptive innovations, and much more.
   

  

**Your day-to-day**
* Advocate for engineering best practices and quality across larger teams and within PayPal, determining technical tasks for other engineers.
* Support the design, implementation, and operational excellence of software components, proactively improving existing structures and processes.
* Complete thorough assessments of implementation alternatives and their tradeoffs, providing recommendations for the technical engineering roadmap.
* Consistently focus on solutions while contributing to the vision of the domain.
* Exercise judgment in reconciling diverse and competing priorities to identify optimal solutions.
* Leverage strategic thinking and experience to anticipate consequences and risks linked to implementation choices, identifying patterns to reduce repetition into meaningful general solutions.
* Serve as a key voice on team-level processes (e.g., code and design reviews) and oversee projects, ensuring accurate, complete, timely, and operable solutions.
* Resolve technical inquiries and provide expert guidance to others.
* Provide technical leadership for a team with limited guidance from management or senior teammates.
* Interact and tailor communication with various technical and non-technical stakeholders, including product, support, and compliance teams.


**What You Need To Succeed**
* Expertise in developing and maintaining mobile applications at scale.
* Strong skills in Swift and Objective C, with knowledge of multi-threaded, asynchronous code.
* Proficiency with the iOS SDK and various frameworks like UIKit, CoreData, etc., and know-how to leverage them effectively to build robust iOS applications.
* In-depth knowledge of consuming GraphQL and REST APIs from mobile applications.
* Passion for mentoring and developing other software engineers.
* Ability to discuss and clarify complex topics with technical and non-technical audiences.
* Well-versed in testing best practices and familiarity with at least one testing framework for mobile development. Skilled at writing unit and automation tests.
* Expertise in the MVVM design pattern.
* Solid grasp of structured concurrency and Combine.


**We Believe in You**
 We know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates. Please don’t hesitate to apply and / or let's chat!
   

  

 \_
   

  

 For the majority of employees, PayPal's balanced hybrid work model offers 3 days in the office for effective in-person collaboration and 2 days at your choice of either the PayPal office or your home workspace, ensuring that you equally have the benefits and conveniences of both locations.
   

  

**Our Benefits:**
 At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset—you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life. We champion your financial, physical, and mental health by offering valuable benefits and resources to help you care for the whole you.
   

  

 We have great benefits including a flexible work environment, employee shares options, health and life insurance and more. To learn more about our benefits please visit https://www.paypalbenefits.com
   

  

**Who We Are:**
 To learn more about our culture and community visit https://about.pypl.com/who-we-are/default.aspx
   

  

**Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**
 PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at paypalglobaltalentacquisition@paypal.com.
   

  

**Belonging at PayPal:**
 Our employees are central to advancing our mission, and we strive to create an environment where everyone can do their best work with a sense of purpose and belonging. Belonging at PayPal means creating a workplace with a sense of acceptance and security where all employees feel included and valued. We are proud to have a diverse workforce reflective of the merchants, consumers, and communities that we serve, and we continue to take tangible actions to cultivate inclusivity and belonging at PayPal.
   

  

 Any general requests for consideration of your skills, please Join our Talent Community.
   

  

 We know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates. Please don’t hesitate to apply.
   

  

 REQ ID R0112183

title: Engineering professionals Hydraulic modeling
description:
**Do you want to contribute to the COWI's global projects? Can you envision yourself in a specialist role where you make your mark on both large prestigious hydraulic projects and on the projects on local scale? And are you specialized and experienced at working with hydraulics modelling? Then, this could be the right opportunity for you.**







  




**Create the solutions that will enable a better tomorrow**
 We are looking for a Hydraulic Modelling Specialist to join our team in Sweden. You will be a part of the team working closely with colleagues from Sweden but also globally (primarily Denmark, Poland and Norway) both independently and as a supervisiro for junior colleauges. In addition, you will be cooperating with COWI projects team in the field of hydraulics for 1D and 2D modelling (overland, pipe and river).  
   

  








  





 Your key responsibilities will be to: 
 
  
   

  







* Manage projects within hydraulical 1D and 2D models, do calculations and preparing reports.
* Work actively with cross functional teams to generate ideas for improving performance.
* Compile computational data for simulations in MIKE software.
* Collaborate on MIKE modelling, drafting comprehensive reports to support decision-making.
* Lead smaller projects



  




**Your Skills. Our Team. Together We Design the Future**
  
   


 The first step to success in this role is that you are eager to collaborate with the people around you, whether they are colleagues, partners or customers. Developing ties with others is something you do by acting respectfully and delivering on your promises. And you never get set in your ways but keep exploring new insights and ways to improve.
 
  
   

  








  





 On top of that, you will have: 
 
  
   

  







* Relevant education containing courses within hydraulics with minimum 7 years of work experience in hydraulic modelling, in 1D and 2D for various scenarios
* Proficiency in hand calculations of discharge and dimensioning, with strong analytical skills
* Familiarity with MIKE software suite such as MIKE+, MIKE11, MIKE Urban, MIKE Flood (coupled models) and ArcGIS/QGIS, HecRas and Scalgo Live
* Proven problem-solving skills and fluency in the Swedish and English language, both written and verbal



  




**A place to work and so much more**







  




 At COWI, we work together with our customers to shape a sustainable and liveable world. We do it by applying our knowledge and curiosity - and sometimes even our courage - to create the solutions the world needs today to enable a better tomorrow. That is why we say no to fossil-based projects and aspire to have 100% of our revenue come from activities that move our customers towards sustainability.
   

  








  




 We value differences and development and cultivate an environment of belonging and having fun. Because that is what brings out the best in you, at work and at home.
   

  








  




 With offices primarily located in the Nordic region, the UK, North America and India, we are currently more than 8,000 people who bring their expertise in engineering, architecture, energy and environment into play.
   

  








  




**Got more questions?**







  




 If you have any unanswered questions about the role or what we have to offer, please reach out to
   

  








  




 Ann Jansson, Head of Discipline, at ajns@cowi.com or +46 108501539.
   

  








  




 If you want to apply, apply via the link, we are eager to hear from you! Apply directly as the role may be filled before the ad's closing date.
   

  








  




 Get to know us even better at our website, www.cowi.com, where you can learn more about our projects, our strategy, what we want to achieve and what life is like at COWI.
   

  








  




**Before you apply**







  




 We would like to hear from you, apply via the link. Apply as soon as possible as the position can be assigned before end date.
   

  








  




**Equal Opportunities for All**







  




 At COWI, we value equal opportunities for all employees and applicants based on individual circumstances without regard to gender, gender identity, gender expression, ethnicity, sexual orientation, disability, or age.

title: RTE & Leveransansvarig till Agria Djurförsäkring
description:
*Har du stor erfarenhet av och engagemang för att med hög kvalitet och precision leverera IT tillsammans med affären? Trivs du i en lean-agil arbetsform och brinner för att bygga starka team? Delar du dessutom vårt intresse för djur? Då kan du vara den vi söker. Välkommen med din ansökan!*
**Om jobbet**
 Agria Djurförsäkring befinner sig i en spännande resa på väg mot målet att bli Europas största djurförsäkringsbolag. För oss inom avdelning Utveckling innebär det många roliga utmaningar, inte minst vår pågående lean-agila transformation och moderniseringen av hela vår IT-förmåga. För att möjliggöra detta söker vi nu en Release Train Engineer och Leveransanvarig till vår största och viktigaste leveransorganisation.
   

  

 Som RTE och Leveransanvarig för Agrias "Mina Djur"- tåg leder du vår största och viktigaste leveransorganisation. Vårt tåg levererar såväl förvaltning som affärsutveckling inte bara för vår svenska verksamhet utan även för större delen av vår europeiska affär.
   

  

 I rollen kommer du att ingå i vår tågledning tillsammans med vår Product Manager och vår tågarkitekt. Du leder tillsammans med våra Scrum Masters våra 11 agila team bestående av såväl medarbetare som konsulter. Du säkerställer god effektivitet, precision och kvalitet i våra leveranser vad avser såväl förvaltning som nyutveckling.
   

  

 Som RTE och Leveransanvarig kommunicerar du konstant med många intressenter, hanterar hinder och risker och arbetar proaktivt för att möjliggöra realisering av våra roadmaps i linje med våra affärsmål. Du driver kontinuerliga förbättringar för att säkerställa framdrift, effektivitet och inte minst gemensamt engagemang. I rollen ingår att vara en coachande ledare som utgår från vår starka kultur och de lean-agila principerna och som får tågledning, Scrum masters och team att växa.
   

  

 Du ingår också i vår ledningsgrupp för Utvecklings- och Leveransstyrning (APMO/LACE) där hela Agrias portfölj och övriga leveransorganisationer drivs och koordineras. Därifrån drivs även vår pågående lean-agila transformation i vilken du är en nyckelperson i din roll och coachande ledare för vårt tåg.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig som:
   

  

* Har minst 10 års erfarenhet av att leda och styra IT-leveranser avseende såväl nyutveckling som förvaltning – i roller som projektledare, RTE eller andra större leveransformer.
* Mångårig erfarenhet och ett starkt intresse av att arbeta lean-agilt och står bakom dess principer. Du har arbetat enligt etablerade skalade agila ramverk såsom ex.vis SAFe
* Du har ett intresse av att utveckla människor, verksamhet och arbetsprocesser med vana att hantera konflikter och hinder om de uppstår.
* Har erfarenhet av att genomföra modernisering av legacy IT.
* Har god förståelse för digitala finansiella tjänsteverksamheter och internationell miljö.
* Du har en solid bakgrund inom IT som ger dig god förståelse för tekniska utmaningar och möjligheter – du kan förstå och facilitera dialog med alla roller i ett digitalt utvecklingsteam.
* Du behärskar svenska samt engelska i både tal och skrift med god kommunikationsförmåga


 Meriterande om du har erfarenhet från:
   

  

* Digitalisering inom djur och veterinärvård och/eller sakförsäkring
* Linjechef och personalledande befattning


 Som person är du positiv, driven och engagerad. Du trivs som bäst när du tillsammans med och genom andra lyckas genomföra utmanande förflyttningar och nå högt satta mål. Du är en stark kommunikatör som förmår att göra det komplicerade och utmanande greppbart även för verksamhet och ledning. Ditt ledarskap baseras på delaktighet, målstyrning och coaching, men du vet också att ditt ledarskap och styrningen i en organisation måste anpassas efter förutsättningarna. Du är passionerad och entusiasmerande, på så vis får du förtroende och skapar engagemang.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Välkommen till Agria Djurförsäkring – en plats där vi skapar trygghet för djur och människor. Allt vi gör, gör vi för djuren. Det genomsyrar hela vår medarbetarkultur och märks i alla beslut vi fattar. Vi tror på att människor med en genuin passion för djur är nyckeln till att förmedla vårt erbjudande och att upprätthålla våra mål, mission och löften.
   

  

 Vi vill bidra till en kreativ och lärande miljö där du som vill utveckla dig själv och verksamheten ska kunna göra det. En miljö där vi som arbetsgivare ger dig rätt stöd och ledarskap. Tillsammans skapar vi en inkluderande arbetsplats att trivas i och vi välkomnar alla, oavsett bakgrund.
   

  

 Agria växer i Europa och har idag verksamhet i Sverige, Norge, Finland, Danmark, Storbritannien, Tyskland, Frankrike, Irland och Nederländerna. På Agria arbetar cirka 650 medarbetare. I koncernen ingår även dotterbolaget Agria Vet Guide som erbjuder digital veterinärrådgivning.
   

  

 Var med oss på resan att skapa Europas största och mest valbara djurförsäkringsbolag för att skapa trygghet för fler djur och människor.
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-10-18**

title: Senior Software Engineer – Back End (Bangkok based – Relocation provided)
description:
**About Agoda**
 Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with a global network of 4.7M hotels and holiday properties worldwide, plus flights, activities, and more . Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 7,100+ employees representing 95+ nationalities in 27 markets foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership, enhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.
   

  

**Our Purpose –** 
**Bridging the World Through Travel**
 We believe travel allows people to enjoy, learn and experience more of the amazing world we live in. It brings individuals and cultures closer together, fostering empathy, understanding and happiness.
   

  

 We are a skillful, driven and diverse team from across the globe, united by a passion to make an impact. Harnessing our innovative technologies and strong partnerships, we aim to make travel easy and rewarding for everyone.
   

  

**Get to Know our Team**
 In Agoda’s Back-End Engineering department, we build scalable, fault-tolerant systems and APIs that host our core business logic. Our systems cover all major areas of our business: inventory and pricing, product information, customer data, communications, partner data, booking systems, payments, and more. We employ state-of-the-art CI/CD and testing techniques to ensure everything works without downtime. Our systems are self-healing, responding gracefully to extreme loads or unexpected input. We use modern languages like Kotlin and Scala, Data technologies Kafka, Spark, MLflow, Kubeflow, VastStorage, StarRocks and agile development practices. Most importantly, we hire great people from around the world and empower them to be successful.
   

  

**The Opportunity**
 Agoda Platform team is looking for developers to work on mission-critical systems that serve millions of users daily. You will have the chance to work on innovative projects, using cutting-edge technologies, and make a significant impact on our business and the travel industry.
   

  

**What You’ll Need To Succeed**
* 5+ years of experience developing performance-critical applications in a production environment using Scala, Java, Kotlin, C#, Go or relevant modern programming languages.
* Strong RDBMS knowledge (SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, or other).
* Ability to design and implement scalable architectures
* Deeply involved in hands-on coding, developing and maintaining high-quality software solutions on a daily basis
* Good command of the English language.
* Engages in cross-team collaborations to ensure cohesive solutions
* Implement advanced CI/CD pipelines and robust testing strategies to ensure seamless integration, deployment, and high code quality.
* Passion for software development and continuous improvement of your knowledge and skills.


**It’s Great if You Have**
* Knowledge in NoSQL, Queueing systems (Kafka, RabbitMQ, ActiveMQ, MSMQ), and Play framework.

title: Master Thesis, 30 HP: Artificial intelligence in defence applications
description:
*Passionate about making ideas a reality? Join our welcoming world of tech and let your ideas soar.*
**Your role**
**Background**
 Saab is dedicated to keeping people and society safe. On this journey we are continuously looking into new technologies.
   

  

 Artificial Intelligence (AI) has been rapidly transforming various industries, and its impact on defence and security is no exception. The defence industry is leveraging AI to enhance decision-making, improve situational awareness, and develop next-generation technologies for a safer and more secure world.
   

  

 We are now looking for students with a passion for AI and machine learning to perform thesis work connected to our applications and systems.

 Technologies that we are interested in are federated learning, RAG applications, reinforcement learning, adversarial attacks, graph neural networks to mention a few.

 The master thesis will consist of a theoretical study phase and a practical work phase, where theoretical findings are put into action in order to validate theory and analyse your findings.

title: Master Thesis: Wi-Fi performance
description:
Join our Team
   

  

**About this opportunity:**
 Ericsson Research develops new communication solutions and standards. The organization has the responsibility to provide Ericsson with world-class system concepts, technology innovations, and methodology.
   

  

 Research Area Radio is responsible for providing advanced system and signal processing solutions, including multi-antenna concepts, targeting standardization of radio access systems as well as implementation in network nodes and devices.
   

  

 Wireless communication aims toward providing ubiquitous communication which can meet a range of use cases and scenarios. The industry 4.0 vision describes such a use case for smart connected factories. This use case requires stationary machines, sensors and devices to be connected but also moving objects such as drones, mobile robots and humans. This allows flexible manufacturing setups not bound by cables and factories that are fully automated. Stringent requirements on the radio access technology used in these environments are necessary as both latency and reliability become key for the viability of such a use case.
   

  

 The Wi-Fi Alliance are currently working on a new Wi-Fi version 7. Wi-Fi 7 comes with restricted Target Wake Time (R-TWT) and multi-link operation (MLO), which in combination allows Wi-Fi access points to schedule service periods intended for low latency transmissions and simultaneously operate over multiple radio interfaces. Additionally, new unlicensed spectrum in the 6 GHz band has been made available totaling 1.2 GHz of spectrum in the US and roughly 500 MHz in the EU. By employing proper frequency planning in combination with these new features Wi-Fi networks can provide a more controlled environment with less unpredictability compared to previous generation of Wi-Fi in respect to both interference and channel access. In order for a Wi-Fi network to be able to guarantee reliability and meet these stringent latency limits having a controlled, unpredictable environment is essential.
   

  

 Thus, the purpose of this thesis is to evaluate if a Wi-Fi network truly is able to provide a controlled environment in indoor industrial scenarios. Depending on the assumptions on e.g., the load in the network, the available spectrum and operating bandwidths, a qualitative study is to be performed using our simulator tools.
   

  

**What you will do:**
 In order to answer the above-mentioned hypothesis, the student will have to design an industrial scenario for evaluation as well as implement the relevant features under study. Furthermore, the student will take the scenario and evaluate it using one of our system simulators to capture the time dependent characteristics of low latency data.
   

  

 Thus, it is required by the student to work in research driven manner and iteratively update both the models and the assumption to build a comprehensive understanding of the challenges in such a complicated scenario.
   

  

**The skills you bring:**
*This project aims at students in electrical engineering, computer science, computer engineering, engineering physics or similar. The student should have the following qualifications:*
* Wireless communication knowledge
* Preferably hands on experience with Monte Carlo simulations
* Programming skills in Java, Python, Matlab
* Innovative and creative thinking
* English written and spoken


**Why join Ericsson?**
 At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.
   

  

**What happens once you apply?**
 Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.
   

  

 Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.
   

  

**Primary country and city:** 
 Sweden (SE) || Stockholm
   

  

**Req ID:**

title: Master Thesis - Physics
description:
Are you in the end of your studies within engineering physics, medical physics, computer science or similar and want to make an impact with technology in cancer treatment? RaySearch now offers one Master Thesis position within physics, starting in January 2025.
   

  

*“Starting my master thesis at RaySearch, as an engineering physics student without much background in medical physics, I was awed by the intricate and fascinating problems that are being solved within this field. After being given the chance to combine high-performance programming with modern physics in a setting where every advancement results in improved cancer treatment for patients world-wide, it's almost hard to imagine doing something else.”*
 Gustav Lidberg, System Developer, Physics
   

  

**We Offer The Following Master Thesis Project**
**Master Thesis project: Modeling of imaging devices in photon radiotherapy**
 The most used type of radiotherapy is delivered with photons from a linear accelerator (LINAC). Modern LINACs are equipped with flat panel imaging devices used to verify the correct placement of the patient before starting treatment. In recent years, flat panels have also been identified as a versatile tool to monitor if the correct dose is delivered to the patient. Such a tool can substantially increase speed and safety in radiotherapy and thus enable more advanced treatments with improved patient outcomes.
   

  

 The proposed project aims at developing methods to calibrate different types of LINACs and imaging devices to predict flat panel images using the RaySearch dose computation algorithms. In this work, both external and RaySearch developed Monte Carlo codes will be used to explore different correlations between the physical properties of the flat panel, the quality of the photon radiation and the resulting image. Basic understanding of the underlying physical processes, analysis of the simulation results and programming will be important parts of the project. If time permits, the proposed method to calibrate the imaging devices could be implemented in the RaySearch code base.
   

  

 Starting your career at RaySearch
   

  

**Joining RaySearch As a Master Thesis Student, You Will**
* … get a solid introduction to our company, products and ways of working.
* …become part of an innovative global Swedish company with head office and R&D department in central Stockholm with a chance of full-time employment after graduation.
* … join 200 well-educated and dedicated engineers who enjoy knowledge sharing, problem solving and working in teams.
* … work with cutting-edge technology for cancer treatment. Your daily work will contribute to improve cancer treatments for patients all over the world.


 Our office
   

  

 Our office is located in Hagastaden, Stockholm's Life Science Hub, with a modern and creative work environment. We offer a private gym, yoga, and social activities such as table tennis, foosball, and regular after-work events. Our bistro serves a fantastic lunch buffet, and every day we provide morning fika, as well as afternoon snacks. Our rooftop terrace offers a stunning view of Stockholm.
   

  

**Who can apply?**
 Master students with a big interest in programming as well as physics. The start of the thesis project is planned for January 2025.
   

  

 You are a master student within physics, medical engineering, computer science or similar. You have a great interest in software development and contributing to our mission. Programming skills, relevant hobby projects and summer/part time jobs within software development, mathematical or physics modeling are highly valued.
   

  

 It’s an advantage, but not required, if you also have experience in C++ or C# development.
   

  

 We only offer thesis projects that are performed by a single student.
   

  

**Application**
 Please apply to the position through the application form below. Selection and interviews will be ongoing. In your application letter, please state which project(s) you are particularly interested in. We do not accept applications by e-mail.

title: Thesis Project: 30 hp - AI assisted validation and verification of software
description:
**Introduction**
 Thesis work is an excellent way to get closer to Scania and build relationships for the future. Many of today's employees began their Scania career with their degree project. With the current boom in AI, work has started to investigate how it can be used as a tool to optimize different tasks and improve quality.
   

  

**Background**
 In verification and validation a variety of different tools and systems to handle system requirements, test case protocols and test case scripts. Given the nature of requirements writing, they can be susceptible to interpretation by the tester. Also, since requirements for the same system can be written by different people, they can be contradictory.
   

  

 The method used today to counter these issues are reviews where the requirement and test documents are proof-read and approved. With the current advancements in Large Language Models (LLMs), this type of work can be greatly automated to provide consistency across system level requirements and better test case coverage to achieve higher software quality with current or increased development speed.
   

  

**Objectives**
* AI verifying the test protocols against test scripts
* AI to review requirements-test cases for test coverage
* AI for creation of test cases
* AI impact analysis of new functionality to existing requirements
* AI to understand high risk situations that quality control should prioritise
* AI for verifying test methods and test cases against regulated protocols such as ISO26262


 '
   

  

**Job Description**
 One or more of the suggested objectives should be included in the goal of the thesis. The formulation of the goals could be refined during the thesis work.
   

  

 Take the opportunity to work in a global organization with the development of Scania's and Tratons trucks and buses. We are a close-knit group that adds customer value by ensuring the quality of the conventional and electrified powertrains. Our group is characterized by a creative and helpful environment where everyone's voice is heard.

title: Master Thesis: 6G XR performance
description:
Join our Team
   

  

**About this opportunity:**
 Ericsson Research develops new communication solutions and standards. The organization has the responsibility to provide Ericsson with world-class system concepts, technology innovations, and methodology.
   

  

 Research Area Radio is responsible for providing advanced system and signal processing solutions, including multi-antenna concepts, targeting standardization of radio access systems as well as implementation in network nodes and devices.
   

  

 The era of 6G will be defined by a new cyber-physical world offering true wireless intelligence. The value of 6G extends far beyond enhanced mobile broadband (eMBB) and high data rates and enables advancements in a wide range of application areas, including extended reality (XR) and holographic communication. XR is an umbrella term that covers immersive technologies ranging from virtual reality (VR) to mixed reality (MR) and augmented reality (AR). In contrast to eMBB, the majority of the emerging XR applications are time critical in nature with demanding requirements on application bitrates and reliable low latency. The level of augmentation can vary from a simple information display to the addition of virtual objects and even complete augmentation of the real world, and so do the service requirements.
   

  

 To ensure low-latency, high-reliability, and high-capacity connectivity we are challenged to design networks with time-critical communication (TCC) features together with general coverage and capacity features. Examples of such features include traffic awareness in the RAN, congestion mitigation techniques such as admission control, robust link adaptation, and dynamic scheduling with priorities. The XR users are considered satisfied, when they pass the admission controls and the packets fulfill the delay and reliability requirements, otherwise the packets are blocked and user experience drops. User satisfaction and the overall network performance will depend on the scenario, the service characteristics and the combination of utilized features.
   

  

 Join Ericsson as a Researcher where you will have the opportunity to be at the forefront of technology innovation, conducting extensive research in various fields to transform our business strategies. You will play a crucial role in the discovery and development of new Intellectual Property Rights (IPRs), creating efficient and competitive tools, demos, and testbeds. You'll get to drive external relation initiatives, influence standardization, and enable effective knowledge transfer within the organization. Moreover, you will lead and shape our scientific research, establishing Ericsson as a leader in technological innovation.
   

  

**What you will do:**
 The main focus of the thesis project is to evaluate the performance of a real network with XR users. The scenario for evaluation requires a map, deployment, XR traffic characteristics, propagation models etc. The student will use such a scenario to utilize a set of TCC features and perform system simulations that capture the XR user satisfaction e.g. the delay distribution for each user. The analysis would require algorithm tuning and a sensitivity analysis. Thus, it is required by the student to work in research driven manner and iteratively update both the models and the assumptions to build a comprehensive understanding of the challenges in such a complicated scenario.
   

  

**The skills you bring:**
 This project aims at students in electrical engineering, computer science, computer engineering, engineering physics or similar. The student should have the following qualifications:
   

  

* Wireless communication knowledge
* Preferably hands on experience with Monte Carlo simulations
* Programming skills in Matlab, Python
* Innovative and creative thinking
* English written and spoken

title: Master thesis – Change Management | People Engagement
description:
At Stora Enso Packaging Solutions, we are introducing a new Operational Excellence Model. As part of this initiative, we are offering an opportunity for a master thesis project. Join our team and play a key role in our continuous improvement efforts!
   

  

**Innovate for a better climate. Every day.**
 As we introduce a new Operational Excellence Model, it is crucial that this “new way of working” is perceived as valuable by the organization, especially since this is not our first initiative in this area. To support this, we are seeking candidates for a master thesis project focused on change management and people engagement.
   

  

 Your main objective will be to identify the key requirements for successfully introducing new programs and engaging the people. You will analyze previous “division drive projects” to understand their impact and gather insights. Your findings will provide valuable input for improvement opportunities when introducing our new Operational Excellence Model. To achieve this, you will collaborate with the Packaging Solutions Operational Excellence Team, conduct site visits, and perform interviews with selected individuals to understand how changes are perceived and what factors contribute to success or failure.
   

  

 This is an excellent opportunity to contribute to a significant organizational transformation while gaining valuable experience in change management and people engagement. We are offering this master thesis topic and after agreeing with your supervisor you will together plan and design all parts of the project so that it will suit you, Stora Enso and your school. In this project we would like you to work with a thesis partner for best possible results and support from us.
   

  

 For this position, we see that you can plan your time and work both from home and at one of our offices, with additional visits to our factories. You will belong to the Packaging Solutions division. The project will be executed during the spring semester 2025, from January to June and therefor consists of 30 HP (Swedish college credits).
   

  

**What We Offer**
 By writing your master thesis with Stora Enso you will get industry insights and valuable contacts for future work life while gaining valuable experience in a leading global company. After finishing your master thesis work with us we encourage you to apply for the offered scholarship from Ljungbergsfonden. They offer scholarships to Swedish university or college students for forestry-related projects carried out in collaboration with Stora Enso. Not the least, by joining Stora Enso for your master thesis project you will contribute towards a more sustainable world, as we believe that anything made from fossil-based materials today can be made from a tree tomorrow.
   

  

**Who are we looking for?**
 We believe that you’re studying in the last year of your master’s program at a Swedish university within Industrial Engineering, Operations Management, or Business Administration with a focus on Human Resources. You are fluent in English.
   

  

**How can you apply for this master thesis project?**
 To apply for this master thesis topic, we want you to send us an application using our recruitment tool. Please attach a CV and cover letter. As we are assessing our candidates on an ongoing basis, we hope to hear from you as soon as possible but latest by
 **October 13th.** 
 The project position might be filled before that and then the ad will be taken down.
   

  

 If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact our Talent Acquisition and Employer Branding Partner Veera Kaislasalo, veera.kaislasalo@storaenso.com.
   

  

**Join the renewable materials company!**
 Part of the global bioeconomy, Stora Enso is a leading provider of renewable products in packaging, biomaterials and wooden construction, and one of the largest private forest owners in the world. We create value with our low-carbon and recyclable fiber-based products, through which we support our customers in meeting the demand for renewable sustainable products. Stora Enso has approximately 20,000 employees and our sales in 2023 were EUR 9.4 billion.
   

  

 See our film

title: Master thesis – Production optimization | Blueprint Project
description:
At Stora Enso Packaging Solutions, we are committed to optimizing our production processes across Europe. We are now opening up opportunities to write a master thesis with us – Join us to explore synergies and differences in our factories and contribute to our continuous improvement efforts!
   

  

**Innovate for a better climate. Every day.**
 There are many process synergies between our factories in Europe, and at the same time, there are quite some differences. With this project, we focus on the process similarities between our factories and how we are organized from a human resources point of view.
   

  

 You will work on creating a production blueprint for our European Corrugated organization by mapping how we are resourced. With this mapping, you will also identify the different criteria used by our units, such as skill level requirements and the balance between flexible and permanent workforce. Your findings will provide valuable insights and input for improvement opportunities.
   

  

 To achieve this, you will perform site visits to various locations. You will connect with selected sites to collect information and ensure a thorough understanding of the operational processes. Additionally, you will conduct interviews with selected managers to gather detailed insights. You will compare the level of automation in the production lines and, where necessary, perform more detailed analyses on factors such as the impact of the product mix.
   

  

 We are offering this master thesis topic and after agreeing with your supervisor you will together plan and design all parts of the project so that it will suit you, Stora Enso and your school. In this project we would like you to work with a thesis partner for best possible results and support from us.
   

  

 For this position, we see that you can plan your time and work both from home and at one of our offices, with additional visits to our factories. You will belong to the Packaging Solutions division. The project will be executed during the spring semester 2025, from January to June and therefor consists of 30 HP (Swedish college credits).
   

  

**What We Offer**
 By writing your master thesis with Stora Enso you will get industry insights and valuable contacts for future work life while gaining valuable experience in a leading global company. After finishing your master thesis work with us we encourage you to apply for the offered scholarship from Ljungbergsfonden. They offer scholarships to Swedish university or college students for forestry-related projects carried out in collaboration with Stora Enso. Not the least, by joining Stora Enso for your master thesis project you will contribute towards a more sustainable world, as we believe that anything made from fossil-based materials today can be made from a tree tomorrow.
   

  

**Who are we looking for?**
 We believe that you’re studying in the last year of your master’s program at a Swedish university within Industrial Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Operations Management, or Supply Chain Management. You are fluent in English.
   

  

**How can you apply for this master thesis project?**
 To apply for this master thesis topic, we want you to send us an application using our recruitment tool. Please attach a CV and cover letter. As we are assessing our candidates on an ongoing basis, we hope to hear from you as soon as possible but latest by
 **October 13th.** 
 The project position might be filled before that and then the ad will be taken down.
   

  

 If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact our Talent Acquisition and Employer Branding Partner Veera Kaislasalo, veera.kaislasalo@storaenso.com.
   

  

**Join the renewable materials company!**
 Part of the global bioeconomy, Stora Enso is a leading provider of renewable products in packaging, biomaterials and wooden construction, and one of the largest private forest owners in the world. We create value with our low-carbon and recyclable fiber-based products, through which we support our customers in meeting the demand for renewable sustainable products. Stora Enso has approximately 20,000 employees and our sales in 2023 were EUR 9.4 billion.

title: Thesis Project: 30 hp - Optimising rigg electronics (ECU:s and surrounding environment) for SW verif
description:
**Introduction**
 Thesis work is an excellent way to get closer to Scania and build relationships for the future. Many of today's employees began their Scania career with their degree project.
   

  

**Background**
 With the need to verify powertrain software controls continuously and reduce test cycle times, it is necessary to have a stable and reliable testing environment which can be deployed quickly. With the drastic improvements in computing power CPUs and power electronics, it is possible to reduce the size of existing hardware testing systems. The aim is to develop a fully functional hardware-in-loop system which is a miniaturized version of the existing testing systems.
   

  

**Objective**
* Developing a new HiL concept
* Evaluate options for RTPCs and HiL power electronics to support ECU testing
* Optimising HiL electronics (ECU:s and surrounding environment) for SW verification and validation purposes
* Working on a proof of concept for the new HiL concept


**Job Description**
 One or more of the suggested objectives should be included in the goal of the thesis. The formulation of the goals could be refined during the thesis work.
   

  

 Take the opportunity to work in a global organization with the development of Scania's and Tratons trucks and buses. We are a close-knit group that adds customer value by ensuring the quality of the conventional and electrified powertrains. Our group is characterized by a creative and helpful environment where everyone's voice is heard.
   

  

 We solve our challenges cross-functionally in agile teams with common goals, where both the individual and the team have major impact on the final product. Personal development is key and we put great emphasis on allowing you to grow and develop in the role.
   

  

**Education/program/focus**
 Master of science in Mechanical engineering, Mechatronics, Electronics, Mechatronics, Automotive or similar.
   

  

 Basic programming/Simulink knowledge is meriting.
   

  

 Number of students:1-2
   

  

 Start date for the thesis work: January 6 (could be adjusted) 2025
   

  

 To be conducted during the spring of 2025.
   

  

**Contact persons and supervisors**
 Andreas Szilassy (manager), andreas.szilassy@scania.com, +46 736688223
   

  

 Sandeep Vikram Kumar (supervisor), sandeep.vikram.kumar@scania.com, +46 764219659
   

  

**Application:**
 Your application must include a CV, personal letter and transcript of grades
   

  

 A background check might be conducted for this position. We are conducting interviews continuously and may close the recruitment earlier than the date specified.

title: Join Greenely's Mission as a DevOps Engineer
description:
Jobbify är en jobbplattform för vassa kandidater.
  
För kunds räkning har vi publicerat denna annons, vill du komma i kontakt med den slutgiltiga arbetsgivaren kan du klicka dig vidare till annonsen:
  
  

At Greenely, we’re pioneering Europe's energy transition by making energy consumption smarter and household energy bills lower. We’re looking for a skilled DevOps Engineer to join us on this ambitious journey, driving innovation in infrastructure and automation to support our growing platform. Your work will directly contribute to building a greener future by enhancing the technology behind our energy-saving solutions.
  
  

As part of our mission, we are currently migrating from EC2-based compute to ECS, optimizing our infrastructure, and improving resilience. We're looking for someone with the experience and vision to help lead this transformation.
  
  

**Your daily work includes:**  

Designing, building, and maintaining platform components in AWS to support our development infrastructure.
  
  

Optimizing infrastructure provisioning through Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) practices using Terraform, ensuring robust monitoring and alerting.
  
  

Troubleshooting complex production issues alongside cross-functional teams, ensuring high uptime and reliability.
  
  

Leading on-call incident response and actively participating in service restoration when needed.
  
  

Streamlining our CI/CD pipelines and automating deployment processes for rapid, reliable releases.
  
  

Empowering the engineering team with automation solutions that accelerate development.
  
  

**What you'll need to succeed:**  

**Cloud Expertise:** Hands-on experience with AWS services (EKS, ECS, S3, RDS, Route53) and deep knowledge of scaling cloud environments.
  
  

**Backend Development:** Proficiency in Python-based frameworks and microservices architectures.
  
  

**Containerization:** Expertise in deploying containerized applications using Kubernetes and Docker, along with experience in migrating services to container orchestration tools like EKS and ECS.
  
  

**Database Management:** Proven experience with relational databases like Postgres/MySQL, as well as NoSQL solutions like MongoDB/DynamoDB.
  
  

**CI/CD Mastery:** Solid experience in building automated pipelines for testing and deployment, and working with CI/CD tools like GitHub Actions, Travis CI, or CircleCI.
  
  

**Security and Monitoring:** A strong foundation in Linux systems, security best practices, and experience building monitoring and alerting systems with tools like DataDog or NewRelic.
  
  

**We’ll be really impressed if you:**  

Are passionate about automation and have a proven ability to reduce manual tasks through efficient, scalable solutions.
  
  

Have experience working with Terraform to manage complex cloud environments.
  
  

Can troubleshoot networking, security, and system performance issues with ease.
  
  

Have a deep understanding of DevOps principles and a passion for improving development processes.
  
  

Are a proactive problem solver with excellent communication skills, capable of explaining technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
  
  

Thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment and can juggle multiple tasks while maintaining high quality.
  
  

We place high emphasis on your interpersonal abilities at Greenely. Greenely's strength is drawn from team members who don't just do their job, but who actively shape the way we work. We seek individuals who naturally take charge, own their responsibilities with pride, and consistently hold themselves accountable. We're searching for someone who can gracefully navigate change, who sees challenges not as obstacles but as puzzles waiting to be solved, and who values the collective success of the team.
  
  

**What we can offer you ‍ :**  

**Flexibility:** We are an office-first company that values in-person collaboration, offering flexible work arrangements to support your work-life balance. Our vibrant office is conveniently located in the heart of Stockholm at Vasagatan 40.
  
  

**Growth:** Elevate your career with opportunities for skill development, challenging projects, and advancement within our forward-thinking organization.
  
  

**Influence and Impact:** Your voice matters. Shape the future of energy by contributing your ideas, expertise, and playing a key role in decision-making.
  
  

**Innovative Environment:** Thrive in an ever-changing industry, working on cutting-edge projects and staying ahead of the curve in a dynamic and pioneering work atmosphere.

title: INFRASTRUCTURE - PLATFORM DEVOPS ENGINEER
description:
**STOCKHOLM**PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT
**INFRASTRUCTURE – PLATFORM DEVOPS ENGINEER**
=============================================


Are you an ambitious DevOps Engineer eager to jump in a world of complex challenges to modernise web and globally distributed applications? We are hiring!


RECRUITER
  

ADRIAN KORPI  


**PRODUCT DEVELOPMENT AT BETSSON GROUP**
----------------------------------------



Our Product Development organisation is truly Global with cross functional teams spanning 6 Tech Hubs – Malta, Budapest, Stockholm, Tallinn, Kyiv and Athens. With nearly 600 strong professionals, the Product Development organisation is spear-headed by our CTO-CPO with all our talented Area Teams working together.

  


**A TASTER OF WHAT YOU WILL BE INVOLVED WITH**
----------------------------------------------


* Working with cutting edge technology enabling our Cloud Journey
* The Platform Core team is responsible for managing Infrastructure as Code for parts of our Core Platform Layer (Kubernetes Clusters, Message Broker backends, Infrastructure tooling), providing a distributed runtime platform that ensures optimal performance of our business applications, APIs and websites
* Building our Infrastructure Platforms as self-service to our developers and providing guidance and tooling for developers to self-manage their applications cross environments
* Continuously improve and develop our platforms based on business needs. Analyse, diagnose and solve issues of efficiency performance and scale collaborating cross functional with colleagues from different teams


Right now, we are looking to strengthen further the management of our Kafka Messaging Platform and looking for a DevOps engineer with strong knowledge and experience in managing Kafka infrastructure.

  


**YOU'RE GOOD AT**
------------------


* Strong knowledge and experience in setting up and administering Kubernetes clusters, preferably with experience with AWS EKS and Rancher RKE.
* Strong knowledge and experience of managing Kafka infrastructure in a geo-distributed setup, administration, and configuration of such service.
* Managing Cloud Infrastructure via Infrastructure as Code using Terraform, with a good understanding of terraform modules and workflows.
* Experience working with cloud providers, with AWS as preference, and strong knowledge with Cloud provider services such as EC2, ALBs, VPC, and EKS
* Experience in building scalable and distributed infrastructure
* Experience in using versioned source control to manage code changes
* Familiarity with the open-source monitoring stack of Prometheus/Grafana.
* Ability to write scripts in Python, Bash, Powershell or similar
* Experience in using and managing Linux distributions
* Excellent problem-solving skills, with the ability to analyze complex technical issues and provide effective solutions in a timely manner.
* Knowledge of best practices in IT operations, such as ITIL (IT Infrastructure Library) and DevOps principles.
* Ability to adapt to changing technologies and work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.
* Required to be on an On-call support schedule.


**WHO WE ARE**
--------------



Betsson Group is one of the largest companies within the Global iGaming space and can trace our heritage as far back as the 1960’s. We’re Swedish and publicly listed too with our Operational HQ located on the Mediterranean Island of Malta.



We strive to deliver the best customer experience in the industry. As a market leader within iGaming we offer online gaming products across 12+ jurisdictions and 20+ brands.



You will be part of a passionate team, which is building an industry leading, scalable, multi-brand platform used by hundreds of thousands of our customers!

  


**WHAT WE OFFER**
-----------------



Much like riding a roller-coaster, sometimes life at Betsson can be lightning fast with twists and turns but always FUN! Then again, what else would you expect from a business 75% millennial and 1900 strong, spread across 7 offices! We recognise it may not be for the faint-hearted, but if you’re a go-getter, initiator and always striving to push the boundaries and challenge yourself, then you’ll fit right in.


**CHALLENGE ACCEPTED?**
-----------------------


***By submitting your application, you understand that your personal data will be processed as set out in our*** ***Privacy Policy***
